thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Riyad Bank Q4 Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Riyad Bank Q4 Profit Rises
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - RIYAD BANK SJSC:
* Q4 NET PROFIT 974 MILLION RIYALS VERSUS 293 MILLION RIYALS YEAR AGO
* AS OF END-DEC 2017, LOAN AND ADVANCES STAND AT 138.84 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 2.85 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR
* AS OF END-DEC 2017, CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 154.37 BILLION RIYALS, DOWN 1.48 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR
* Q4 NET PROFIT INCREASED BECAUSE OF LOWER TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES BY 29.2 PERCENT, MAINLY DUE TO DECREASE IN IMPAIRMENT CHARGE FOR CREDIT LOSSES‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
